Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Belmont business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in thirteen business improvement districts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in 13 BIDs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation tothe establishment of the Fulton Street business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Fulton Street Business Improvement District, Brooklyn

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Belmont business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in thirteen business improvement districts
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in 13 BIDs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation tothe establishment of the Fulton Street business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
